name: 曲立全
objective: 包括理論與實驗，由機電所教授共同開課，課程討主要內容介紹機電科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，側重在機電科技與創新設計相關之專業知識。
schedule: 第六週:知識經濟發展架構，產業發展架構，企業價值鏈分析，參訪法藍瓷公司及其價值鏈分析。

name: 蔡孟伸
objective:
包括理論與實驗，由機電所教授共同開課，課程討主要內容介紹機電科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，側重在機電科技與創新設計相關之專業知識。　　

This course presents concepts in optimization techniques using evolutionary technologies. It emphasizes general principles developed over the last two decades in the evolutionary techniques.  We will focus on Genetic Algorithm, Ant Colony Optimization and Particle Swarm Optimization.
schedule:
Week No.　　Contents
1　　Foundation of Genetic Algorithm
2　　Foundation of Genetic Algorithm
3　　Constrained Optimization Problems
4　　Combinatorial Optimization Problems
5　　ACO/PSO
6　　Final Exam
materials:
Mitsuo Gen and Runwei Cheng, Genetic Algorithms & Engineering Design, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 1997.
Selected technical papers.
